      • brightenColor

        public static java.awt.Color brightenColor(java.awt.Color c,
                                           int percent)
        Brightens a given color for a percent; Negative values darken the color.
        Parameters:
        c - The color to brighten.
        percent - The percentage to brighten; Must not exceed 100 percent.
        Returns:
        The new brightened color.

      • tintColor

        public static java.awt.Color tintColor(ColorMixer.Tint type,
                                       java.awt.Color c,
                                       int percent)
        Tints a given color with a certain color and percent.
        Parameters:
        type - The tint that will be applied.
        c - The color to tint.
        percent - The percentage to tint the given color; Must not exceed 100 percent.
        Returns:
        The newly tinted color.

      • blend

        public static java.awt.Color blend(java.awt.Color c0,
                                   java.awt.Color c1,
                                   double percent)
        Blends 2 colors together
        Parameters:
        c0 - The base color
        c1 - The color to shade
        percent - The percent you want to shade c0 with c1
        Returns:
        The new shaded color
